content: --- title: Ground Traffic Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:23:49.307Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:37:00.289Z --- # Ground Traffic Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | regId | `'string'` | Registration id of assigned aircraft | | carrier | `'string'` | Carrier name | | type | `'string'` | Aircraft flight duty type: inbound or outbound | | latitude | `'string'` | Latitude of the position | | longitude | `'string'` | Longtitude of the position | | posMarker | `'string'` | Position marker of runway or taxi way | | time | `'datetime'` | Date and time of the position info in UTC | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information |
fm:title: Ground Traffic Data Model description: published: true date: 2024-09-05T11:23:49.307Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T10:37:00.289Z
